class.name: industrial_trajectory_filters/NPointFilter
class.description: This is a simple filter which reduces a trajectory to N points or less. ROS parameters: - n_points (default = 2)

class.name: industrial_trajectory_filters/UniformSampleFilterAdapter
class.description: This is a simple filter which performs a uniforming sampling of a trajectory using linear interpolation. ROS parameters: - sample_duration (default = 0.050)
